name: CR Item List
query:
SELECT
`tabItem`.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
`tabItem`.item_name as "Item Name:Item:180",
`tabItem`.description as "Item Description:Item:150",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:100",
`tabItem`.stock_uom as "UOM:Item:70",
`tabItem`.is_purchase_item as "Purchase:Item:50",
`tabItem`.is_sales_item as "Sale:Item:50",
`tabItem`.is_pro_applicable as "Production Order:Item:60",
`tabItem`.is_sub_contracted_item as "subcontract:Item:60",
`tabItem`.expense_account as "Expense A/c:Item:100",
`tabItem`.income_account as "Income A/c:Item:100",
`tabItem`.default_warehouse as "Warehouse:Item:80",
`tabItem`.buying_cost_center as "Buying CC:Item:80",
`tabItem`.selling_cost_center as "Selling CC:Item:80",
`tabItem`.last_purchase_rate as "Last Purchase Rate:Currency/Item:100"

FROM
`tabItem`
